text: 100 (also written as one hundred or simply hundred) is the natural number after 99 and before 101. It is the first three-digit number above zero. The number 100 is an abundant number. The letter C is the old Roman numeral for 100. ==Usage== 100 m running competition. In binary and bcd -code, 100 means number four. 100 100
title: 100 (number)
